name: location picker
content:
Gets a x position and  y position from the mouse location on the display. 

Clicking on the pin icon on the right of the blocks highlights the display and enables setting a sprite to be created at (or jump to) an exact location. Once the location is chosen, the block will display the x and y position of the center of the sprite.

examples.description: The location picker makes it easy to place the sprites in locations that match the background.

palette_params.name: location
palette_params.description: The x and y positions of the mouse on the display

short_description: Gets a x position and  y position from the mouse location on the display.
tips: - The display area is 400 pixels x 400 pixels and the upper left corner is (0,0).
